00023 typedef struct {
00024   int A; int Z; int N;
00025   double X[3], V[3];
00026 } gcmpara;
00027 
00028 
00029 void gob_dcm(const gcmpara* para,
00030              const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00031              const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00032              complex double* dcm, gradGaussian* ddcm)
00033 {
00034   int i;
00035   double M;
00036   double* dXcm = para->X;
00037   double* dVcm = para->V;
00038   complex double meXVcm = 0.0;
00039   
00040   M=para->Z*mproton+para->N*mneutron;
00041 
00042   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00043     meXVcm += dXcm[i]*mass(G1->xi)/M* X->rho[i]; 
00044     meXVcm += dVcm[i]/M* X->pi[i]; 
00045   }
00046 
00047   *dcm += meXVcm* X->Q;
00048 
00049   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00050     ddcm->chi[i] += meXVcm* dX->dQ.chi[i];
00051   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00052     ddcm->a += (dXcm[i]*mass(G1->xi)/M* dX->drho.a[i] +
00053                dVcm[i]/M* dX->dpi.a[i])* X->Q;
00054   ddcm->a += meXVcm* dX->dQ.a;
00055   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00056     ddcm->b[i] += (dXcm[i]*mass(G1->xi)/M* dX->drho.b +
00057                   dVcm[i]/M *dX->dpi.b)* X->Q + meXVcm* dX->dQ.b[i];
00058 }

00061 void calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00062                              const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00063                              const OneBodyOperator* op,
00064                              gradSlaterDet* grad)
00065 {
00066   int i;
00067   double dcm[6];
00068   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, op, dcm);
00069 
00070   gcmpara para;
00071   para.A = Q->A; para.Z = Q->Z; para.N = Q->N;
00072   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00073     para.X[i] = dcm[i];
00074   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00075     para.V[i] = dcm[i+3];
00076 
00077   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_dcm = {opt: op->opt, par: &para, me: gob_dcm}; 
00078 
00079   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_dcm, grad);
00080 }

00083 void calcgradCMSlaterDetTBME(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00084                              const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00085                              const TwoBodyOperator* op,
00086                              gradSlaterDet* grad)

00088   int i;

00091

00093   para.A = Q->A; para.Z = Q->Z; para.N = Q->N;
00094   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00095     para.X[i] = dcm[i];
00096   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00097     para.V[i] = dcm[i+3];

00100
